data.eml:eml: Reexamination of the identity and status of the termite taxa described by Czerwinski (1901) from southern Brazil (Isoptera: Termitidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Constantino, Reginaldo (2018): Reexamination of the identity and status of the termite taxa described by Czerwinski (1901) from southern Brazil (Isoptera: Termitidae). Zootaxa 4370 (3): 275-278, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4370.3.6
